articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Sri Lankan President
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Maithripala Sirisena on his election as president of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
					 The message sincerely wished the president big success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop more favorably in conformity with the common interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Funeral Service for Kim Sun Im Held
articles.content:
Funeral Service for Kim Sun Im Held
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A funeral service for late Kim Sun Im, spouse of indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter Ri In Mo, took place here on Sunday. 
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War Kim Sun Im was parted from Ri In Mo, who left for front. She sincerely worked while waiting for more than four decades for her husband the fate of whom she did not know as befitting spouse of the revolutionary solider faithful to the party and the leader. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il met Ri In Mo who was brought back to the fold of the DPRK and also Kim Sun Im and bestowed the highest glory on her, saying that not only her husband but also she were heroes as she maintained her fidelity for her husband for decades. They showed unsparing loving care and benevolence for the family of Ri In Mo and Kim Sun Im. 
					
					 Thanks to their deep trust and care Kim Sun Im tried hard to lead a worthwhile life as befitting spouse of the indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter whom all the members of the country learn after. 
					
					 Upon the sad news of her death, Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Sun Im, expressing deep condolences. He saw to it that the funeral service for her was carried out well. 
					
					 Her bier was visited by Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Yang Gon and other officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and ministries and national institutions and those of the party and power bodies in Pyongyang and former unconverted long-term prisoners on Saturday.
					
					 Present at the funeral service were officials of the WPK Central Committee, bereaved family members and relatives, officials of ministries and national institutions and the party and power bodies of Pyongyang and former unconverted long-term prisoners. 
					
					 Her remains were buried by those of her husband Ri In Mo in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery. 
					
					 A wreath sent by Kim Jong Un was laid before the grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and other institutions. 
					
					 The participants paid silence tribute to the memory of the late.

articles.title: Meetings Held at Scientific Research, Farming Sectors
articles.content:
Meetings Held at Scientific Research, Farming Sectors
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Scientific research, farming, stock-breeding, fishery and light industrial sectors held meetings to vow to implement to the letter the important tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 Reporters and speakers said the New Year address of Kim Jong Un serves as a militant banner for demonstrating the dignity and might of Songun Korea in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 They underscored the need to develop such core basic technologies as IT technology, nano technology and bioengineering onto a higher stage with active pursuit and extraordinary conception as befitting scientists in the great era of Kim Jong Un and contribute to rapidly developing all sectors and building a people's paradise on the strength of science and technology.
					
					 They renewed their pledge to actively introduce scientific farming methods including water-saving farming, increase the proportion of mechanization of farming work, make dynamic efforts to increase fertility of soil to bring about a bumper harvest and thus discharge their duty as masters responsible for the granary of the country.
					
					 They underlined the need to make stock-breeding bases created thanks to the benevolence of the Workers' Party of Korea pay off and thoroughly establish cultured practice in production and life at factories.
					
					 They vowed to briskly organize socialist emulations among enterprises and fishing boats, increase the number of days sailing out fishing and bring about a big haul for supply to the people.
					
					 They said they would produce more goods popular among the people and with worldwide competitiveness and supply them to the people.

articles.title: Solar Brush-wheels Produced
articles.content:
Solar Brush-wheels Produced
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Rangnang District Road and River Administration Company in Pyongyang recently produced solar brush-wheels. 
					 The solar brush-wheel consists of a tricycle and sweeper, both of them powered by a 100-watt solar panel installed as a sunshade. The sweeper has three cleaning brushes and gearings rotating brushes.
					
					 It is capable of cleaning over 20,000 square meters of road per an hour.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm Begins Production
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm Begins Production 
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm was successfully built in a short span of time and started production.
					 All production processes ranging from raw material feeding to forwarding and business management are put on a perfect IT basis.
					
					 The mushroom farm was successfully completed in a matter of a little over one year. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the farm, expressing great satisfaction over the success made by Pyongyang City in the beginning of this significant year.
					
					 Employees of the mushroom farm are registering successes in the production of mushroom for Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Final Victory with Revolutionary Faith
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Final Victory with Revolutionary Faith
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK should remain loyal to the idea and leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and win a brilliant victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation, with the revolutionary faith and obligation they deeply cherished while making a long journey for revolution by following the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Monday.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					  Don't abandon revolutionary faith though one may die. This is the noble spirit running through the whole history of the Korean revolution. This slogan put up by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in the early period of revolution served as a banner which encouraged the army and people of the DPRK to perform military miracles startling the world during the fierce Fatherland Liberation War and protect the party and the leader from all moves of the enemies in the annals of the grim revolution. The Korean people are the heroic people who weathered rigorous trials during the Arduous March, the forced march in the strong spirit of independence not to become slaves of the imperialists though one may lay down one's life and with the solemn pledge not to lower the red flag though one has to eat gruel mixed with grass and the staunch will to make long journeys for the Songun revolution to the last under the leadership of the party and the leader. The Korean revolution could alw
					
					 ays emerge victorious despite all storms of history thanks to the army and people who cherished the revolutionary faith and obligation to remain loyal to the idea and leadership of the party and the leader as their life and soul.
					
					 The might of the harmonious whole of the DPRK in which the leader believes in the army and people, and all service personnel and people hold up the leader with revolutionary faith and obligation has been powerfully demonstrated on the highest level over the past three years.
					
					 Led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the revolutionary ranks of the DPRK have turned into steel-strong units of comrades and units of comrades-in-arms sharing life and death to the end on the road of revolution they should take despite rain or snow and the ever-victorious history and traditions have been given steady continuity.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all people to more firmly cherish the revolutionary faith and obligation and dynamically advance toward the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Action Staged against Authorities' Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Action Staged against Authorities' Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Members of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Committee for Peaceful Reunification under the Pastorate Council for Realizing Justice and Peace and other progressive organizations in south Korea held a press conference at the Christian Church in Seoul on Jan. 8 to denounce the authorities' moves to revive "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The organizations accused the south Korean authorities of suppressing the progressive forces through confiscation and search operations in the wake of forcible disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 The present regime which came to power through election rigging has strictly enforced "yusin" dictatorship in all aspects; it put the people's living into distress and drove the south-north relations into the worst phase by following pro-U.S. country-selling policies, they noted, and went on:  
					
					 The chief executive is working hard to revive "yusin" dictatorship but she will never succeed.
					
					 They declared they would launch a sit-in strike to spark off actions for democracy against "yusin" dictatorship and inform the people of the deplorable situation created by the rule of the present regime under the pretext of security.
					
					 At the end of the press conference they staged a sit-in strike.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Turn out to Mend North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Turn out to Mend North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference at the building of the Taejon City Office on Jan. 7 at which it urged the south Korean authorities to turn out to mend the south-north relations, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News. 
					 Speakers held at the press conference that dialogue should be preceded to mend the south-north relations and it is important to briskly conduct diverse exchange and cooperation. Through them peaceful reunification on the Korean peninsula should be achieved without fail, they said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. sanctions against the north are obstructing the improvement of the south-north relations. 
					
					 The present "government" should not be bound to the U.S. but exert efforts for repairing the relations with the north. 
					
					 The speakers demanded the authorities stop the unreasonable campaign for eliminating "followers of the north" and lift the "May 24 steps".

articles.title: South Korean Media Demand Stop to Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
articles.content:
South Korean Media Demand Stop to Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean media demanded a stop to the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations blocking the improvement of the north-south relations.
					 Kyunghyang Daily News on Jan. 8 urged the authorities to proactively check the leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 The leaflet scattering is nothing but a hurdle to the south-north dialogue as it aims at the "collapse of the north", the daily said.
					
					 Hankuk Ilbo on Jan. 8 reported that the hope for mending the south-north relations that had grown stronger from the outset of the new year was being dashed due to the leaflet scattering.
					
					 The paper accused the regime of not taking a correct stand on the leaflet scattering under the pretext of "freedom of expression" even though it had become a major factor of hindering the south-north dialogue.
					
					 Hangyore on the same day urged the authorities not to sidestep the leaflet scattering.
					
					 Seoul Sinmun on Jan. 9 insisted that it was a right thing to refrain from the leaflet scattering operations that blocked the dialogue between the south and the north.
					
					 KBS on the same day urged the regime to take a positive action, though belatedly, in order not to allow the continuation of the abnormal situation in which the south and the north were barred from having even a contact due to leaflet scattering.

articles.title: US Sanctions against DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
US Sanctions against DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a meeting at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Jan. 7 to denounce the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK.
					 Speakers accused the U.S. of unilaterally slapping sanctions against the north after claiming that it was behind the hacking at the Sony Pictures Entertainment. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The U.S. failed to produce clear evidence proving the hacking case and refused even the north's request for joint investigation.
					
					 The hacking at the entertainment was not targeted against the U.S. government, and the Obama Administration imposed sanctions on Pyongyang under the pretext of the hacking case.
					
					 They held that the U.S. unreasonable sanctions should be lifted at once, saying that the sanctions are chilling the atmosphere of dialogue between the south and the north.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Vow to Implement Tasks Set forth in New Year Address of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Vow to Implement Tasks Set forth in New Year Address of Kim Jong Un
 Tokyo, January 10 (KNS-KCNA) - A meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Jan. 10 to vow to carry out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for Juche 104 (2015) and in his congratulatory message for the New Year.
					 It was attended by Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and other officials.
					
					 The congratulatory message for the New Year sent by Kim Jong Un to Ho Jong Man was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in a report that all the officials of Chongryon are filled with a great ambition and new resolution after receiving Kim Jong Un's New Year address and congratulatory message for the New Year.
					
					 He called on all the officials and activists to turn out as one in the "innovative movement to greet the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with spectacular successes in the drive for a new heyday."
					
					 He underscored the need for all officials of Chongryon to make redoubled efforts to discharge their honorable mission and duty in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's New Year address and congratulatory message.
					
					 Then followed speeches. The speakers renewed their determination to adorn the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with great successes by waging a dynamic patriotic movement for ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan and defending the Chongryon organizations in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Halt Confrontation Racket against Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Halt Confrontation Racket against Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Jan. 10 demanding the south Korean authorities stop confrontation racket against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. is kicking off brigandish provocations while trumpeting about "additional sanctions".
					
					 The south Korean authorities announced they would stage north-targeted war maneuvers in league with foreign forces and are kicking off confrontation racket while prodding human scum into scattering leaflets insulting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 All the members of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China bitterly denounce the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad including the U.S. for deliberately coiling up tension while clinging to provocations and war games infringing upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for successes of dialogue for genuine harmony, they should stop at once the moves for confrontation of systems including provocative war exercises against fellow countrymen, anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign and dropping of anti-DPRK leaflets. 
					
					 All Koreans can open up a broad avenue to independent reunification only when they join efforts as clarified by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address. 
					
					 We Koreans in China will take the lead in the drive for national reunification this year, including the work to strengthen solidarity and alliance with the compatriots in the north and the south and pool intention and efforts by keeping alive the tradition of the June 15 era.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Korean in US
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Korean in US
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Suk, Korean in the U.S., released an article in praise of Marshal Kim Jong Un's will to achieve national reunification and his politics of love for the people on January 2. 
					 Noting that she was greatly impressed by the New Year address made by Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, she went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said in his New Year address nothing is impossible if our nation shares one purpose and joins efforts, expressing the firm will to put an end to the history of national split and indicated specific ways for doing so. 
					
					 It is a bold proposal reflecting the mission to achieve reunification as it said the north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems, while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity true to the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation. 
					
					 While watching Kim Jong Un ascribing all the successes made in the building of a thriving socialist nation to all the people and sending a warm salute to them, I found the image of the genuine patriotic leader loving the country and its people. 
					
					 He stressed once again the need to enforce the politics of respecting, loving and depending on the people so that the popular masses' interests are met. 
					
					 Indeed, his New Year address helps people understand again how advantageous the politics in the north is. It is obviously a chicanery to talk about "human rights issue" in the north where socialist politics centered on the popular masses is pursued. 
					
					 The politics in the north which calls for rejecting abuses of power and bureaucratism, respecting and depending on the people makes me think a lot. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to the north's sincere proposals for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Romanian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Romanian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania fully supports the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and sincerely wishes the Korean people bigger successes in their struggle for building an economic power and reunifying the country under his wise leadership this year, too.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said this in a statement on Jan. 5. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. should desist from pursuing the anachronistic policy hostile to the DPRK and withdraw all its forces of aggression from south Korea as soon as possible to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and boldly make a policy switch to replace the armistice agreement by a peace one.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should roll back its sycophantic and traitorous policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north, stop all forms of war exercises against them and positively respond to the DPRK's proposals for prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania will wage a more dynamic movement for solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 The Korean people will foil the imperialist allied forces' frantic provocations against the DPRK and win the final victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Russian and Ethiopian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Russian and Ethiopian Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Russian and Ethiopian organizations issued statements on Jan. 6 and 7 in support of the New Year address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said:
					
					 We received the New Year address made by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, with great enthusiasm and emotion.
					
					 We, close friends of the DPRK, are greatly rejoiced over the shining successes the party, army and people of the DPRK made in all fields of socialist construction last year, while smashing the U.S. and its stooges' persistent military provocations and blockade against it and winning victory after victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Today the DPRK has become a symbol of pride and dignity for the world progressives.
					
					 The Russian public is fully supporting the DPRK's sincere efforts for improving the relations between the north and the south and reunifying the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 It wholeheartedly wishes the Korean people fresh successes in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea and Songun, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that only victory and glory would be in store for the Korean people working hard to build a thriving nation and achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by New Yugoslav Communist Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by New Yugoslav Communist Party
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un serves as an immortal great programme clearly indicating the orientation and ways for solving the issue of Korea's reunification in the common interests of the nation irrespective of ideologies and systems.
					 Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, said this in a statement on Jan. 5.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party fully supports the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, regarding them as the most reasonable ways for mending the inter-Korean relations and bringing earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should discontinue acts contrary to the desire of all Koreans aspiring after peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula and stop at once large-scale joint military exercises they stage against the DPRK every year.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party is convinced that the Korean people will surely reunify the country under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Jan. 3 in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 He made the significant New Year address at a time when the U.S. imperialists were making more desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In the address he reviewed the great victories and achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK last year in the building of a thriving socialist nation and set forth the tasks for 2015 and the slogan "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!"
					
					 He also advanced the most reasonable and realistic proposals for mending the deteriorated inter-Korean relations and defusing the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 His New Year address serves as important guidelines for the Korean people to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for his address.
					
					 It strongly demanded the U.S. roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and discontinue U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, the root cause of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It renewed the determination to study hard and widely disseminate the address.

articles.title: Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Called for By Regional Body
articles.content:
Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Called for By Regional Body
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions in a statement on Jan. 6 said that the improved inter-Korean relations guarantee independent reunification of Korea and peace on the Korean peninsula.
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Juche idea followers in the east European and central Asian regions fully support the proposals made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification of Korea.
					
					 The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve the great national unity to resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation.
					
					 If they try to force their ideologies and systems upon the other, they will never settle the national reunification issue in a peaceful way but only bring confrontation and war.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not incite distrust between the north and the south but stop acts against the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was entirely just when he in his address called for briskly holding dialogue, negotiations and exchanges and making contact between the north and the south to relink the severed ties and blood vessels of the nation and bringing about a great turn in inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The north and the south should stop quarrels and pave a new way for reunification by concerted efforts.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are sincere in their stand towards improving inter-Korean relations through dialogue, they should be honest in creating the atmosphere and climate for resuming the suspended high-level contacts and holding inter-sector talks and summit.

articles.title: US "Presidential Executive Order" Denounced by British Organizations
articles.content:
US "Presidential Executive Order" Denounced by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Jan. 4 in denunciation of the U.S. announcement of "presidential executive order" against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. announced the above-said "order" which calls for applying "additional sanctions" against the DPRK, though it has already been under harsh sanctions, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. denial of the DPRK's proposal for joint investigation for probing the truth behind the cyber attack on Sony Pictures Entertainment proves that the U.S. is working hard to conceal something and afraid of the disclosure of its truth.
					
					 Hysteric and illogical acts perpetrated by the U.S. to shift the blame for the case onto the DPRK are reminiscent of those in the era of Cold War.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the chief criminals and sworn enemy of the Korean people as evidenced by their production of a movie insulting the dignity and the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 We express full support for the principled stand of socialist Korea advancing, invariably holding high the banner of Songun to cope with the U.S. imperialists' evermore undisguised provocations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Sri Lanka 
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion a Maithripala Sirisena electo presidente de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka.
					En su misiva, el remitente manifiesta su conviccion de que seguiran intensificandose positivamente segun el interes comun de los pueblos de ambos paises las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes. Y le desea de todo corazon al destinatario notables exitos en sus labores responsables.

articles.title: Efectuada ceremonia funeral de difunta Kim Sun Im, esposa de Ri In Mo
articles.content:
Efectuada ceremonia funeral de difunta Kim Sun Im, esposa de Ri In Mo
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en esta capital la ceremonia funeral de la difunta Kim Sun Im, esposa de Ri In Mo, indoblegable combatiente patriotico de la reunificacion.
					Ella trabajo con sinceridad en su cargo como digna esposa esperando a su esposo, soldado revolucionario infinitamente fiel al partido y al lider, sin saber su destino durante mas de 40 anos despues de partida al frente en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se reunieron con ella junto con su esposo que regreso al regazo de la patria, ocasion en la cual dijeron que el esposo es el heroe, pero, es tambien heroina la esposa quien espero a su esposo durante decenas de anos, y brindaron a toda su familia el amor y la benevolencia.
					
					Bajo la gran confianza y el minucioso cuidado de los Generalisimos, ella hizo todo lo posible para dignificar la vida de la esposa del indoblegable combatiente patriotico de la reunificacion.
					
					Tras recibir el parte del deceso de ella, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio una ofrenda floral en senal de profundas condolencias y tomo las medidas de organizar bien los funerales.
					
					El dia 10, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yang Gon y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ministerios y organos centrales, de las instituciones del partido y organo del poder de esta ciudad y los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, expresaron condolencias ante el feretro de la difunta.
					
					El dia siguiente, en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos, hubo una ceremonia de enterrar los restos de la difunta.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios del CC del PTC, las familias y los parientes de la difunta, los funcionarios de Ministerios y organos centrales, las instituciones del partido y el poder de esta ciudad y los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados.
					
					Sus restos mortales fueron enterrados en la misma tumba de su esposo.
					
					Quedo colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales en nombre del CC del PTC, el Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, el Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero y otros organos.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencia en memoria de la difunta Kim Sun Im.

articles.title: Fabrica de Hongos de ciudad de Pyongyang inicia produccion
articles.content:
Fabrica de Hongos de ciudad de Pyongyang inicia produccion
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Entro en la produccion la fabrica de hongos de la ciudad de Pyongyang que fue construida en un corto plazo.
					Se establecieron perfectamente en ella el sistema integral de los procesos de produccion, desde la metida de materias primas hasta el envio de productos, asi como el sistema informativo de la administracion empresarial.
					
					La construccion de la fabrica termino en poco mas de un ano.
					
					En su visita a esta fabrica, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un expreso la gran satisfaccion de que la ciudad de Pyongyang haya preparado el primer exito del significativo ano 2015.
					
					 Los obreros de la fabrica dan buen impulso a la produccion para que los capitalinos se beneficien realmente de sus productos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a luchar por victoria final con conviccion revolucionaria y obligacion moral
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a luchar por victoria final con conviccion revolucionaria y obligacion moral
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- En el editorial difundido este lunes el diario Rodong Sinmun  exhorta a apoyar fielmente la idea y la direccion del Partido con la conviccion revolucionaria y la obligacion moral formadas en el curso de la revolucion bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y alcanzar la resonante victoria de la causa de la revolucion del Juche, y la de la construccion de un Estado prospero y prosigue:
					No abandone la conviccion revolucionaria aunque muera, esto es el noble espiritu penetrado en toda la historia de la revolucion coreana.
					
					 Esta consigna levantada en alto por los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses en el primer tiempo de la revolucion, sirvio de una bandera que permitio al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea crear los milagros militares asombrosos al mundo durante la encarnizada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y venir defendiendo al lider y el Partido frustrando todas las maniobras de los enemigos en las decadas de la severa revolucion.
					
					 El heroico pueblo coreano ha venido superando las severas pruebas de la marcha penosa y la forzada con el espiritu independiente, la firme decision de no abandonarla bandera roja y la voluntad firme de llevar a feliz termino la revolucion del Songun bajo la direccion del Partido y el lider.
					
					 Gracias al ejercito y el pueblo que toman como sus vidas la conviccion revolucionaria y la obligacion moral de apoyar fielmente la idea y la direccion del Partido y el lider, la revolucion coreana pudo lograr victorias tras victorias aun en medio de todos los reveses de la historia.
					
					 El poderio de la union monolitica en que el dirigente confia en el ejercito y el pueblo y estos le apoya con la conviccion revolucionaria y la obligacion moral, se puso de pleno manifiesto durante 3 anos ultimos.
					
					  Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, las filas revolucionarias se han intensificado mas como unidad de camaradas, la de companeros de armas que comparten la vida y muerte en el camino de revolucion y se llevan adelante la invencible historia y tradiciones.
					
					  Todos deben luchar con dinamismo por la victoria final de la causa de la revolucion del Juche, la de construccion de un Estado prospero con la conviccion revolucionaria y la obligacion moral.
